title: Best of The Herd: 10/10/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/10/2019
description:
Colin does not blame Clayton Kershaw for the Dodgers loss, he blames the manager for not putting Kershaw in a position to win. He applauds Jerry Jones for how he is handling Dak Prescott's contract situation and explains why. Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about what is wrong with Baker Mayfield and why some of the reason teams didn't draft Patrick Mahomes are starting to emerge on film. Plus, Colin makes his top 3 college football picks in this week's "Marquee 3"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Colin does not blame Clayton Kershaw for the Dodgers loss, he blames the manager for not putting Kershaw in a position to win. He applauds Jerry Jones for how he is handling Dak Prescott's contract situation and explains why. Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about what is wrong with Baker Mayfield and why some of the reason teams didn't draft Patrick Mahomes are starting to emerge on film. Plus, Colin makes his top 3 college football picks in this week's "Marquee 3"
